meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with the skin and its diseases.
meanings.sent1: In dermatology, doctors specialize in treating skin conditions.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in dermatology to help people with skin problems.
meanings.sent3: The dermatology class was so interesting that even the plants outside wanted to learn about skin diseases.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in dermatology was like a shield against any skin-related issue.
meanings.sent5: Learning about dermatology felt like exploring a whole new world beneath the skin's surface.

meanings.definition: The study of the skin and its functions.
meanings.sent1: Studying dermatology involves understanding how the skin works.
meanings.sent2: He found a fascinating book on dermatology that explained the skin's functions in detail.
meanings.sent3: The cat's interest in dermatology led it to observe its own fur more closely.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the intricacies of dermatology is like unraveling the mysteries of our body's protective layer.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on dermatology made the study of skin functions surprisingly engaging.
